Welcome to the Georgia WARN System
  • Business Layoff/Closure Listing

The Business Layoff and Closure listing contains information reported to the Georgia Department of Labor (GDOL) as required by the Federal Worker Adjustment and Retraining Notification Act (WARN) and other sources. This list is for informational purposes only and is not intended to replace a business's responsibility to WARN legislative requirements.

Geographical Area:Statewide

Year: From 01/01/1998 to 12/31/1998

C = Closure| S = Substantial Layoff > 100 Workers| N = Non-Substantial Layoff < 100 Workers
